alert.note: Alert for Lyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 20 at 8:20AM PDT until July 21 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Reno has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Nevada... East Walker River Above Strosnider Ditch Near Mason affecting Lyon County. .The East Walker river in Lyon County has risen due to recent thunderstorms and high tributary flows. Renewed road flooding of rural roads along the East Walker is possible. Flows are expected to recede below impactful levels by or before Friday afternoon. For the East Walker River...including Strosnider Ditch Near Mason... elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor Flooding from recent thunderstorms below Bridgeport reservoir. * WHERE...East Walker River Above Strosnider Ditch Near Mason. * WHEN...From this morning to tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 8.5 feet, Flood Stage, minor flooding in reach. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM PDT Thursday the stage was 8.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to slowly recede to 7.5` - Action stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood stage is 8.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
